input.sentences: unit 42 gathered together for their annual 4th of july picnic .
they scoped out a beautiful spot out in a campground .

output.sentences: It was a beautiful July day to have a picnic with the troops.
They went to scope out the campground to see were to have the picnic.
They unfolded the American flag for the picnic.
After we ate they took down the stuff in an organized fashion.
Soon everyone looked out and thought about all the sacrifices people made so they can live this way.
